ooc: dunno where both tankor and sharpclaws are, so i'll make 
something up - as is the nature of the beast =)

::SharpClaws::

SharpClaws jumps up as the Predacons base is rocked by heavy blasts. 
His comm crackles as Hydras' voice roars at him and Tankor to 
terminate the enemy. SharpClaws glances over at Tankor, "C'mon 
Tanks' lets lay into whatever's out there."

"Beast mode." he says as he quickly transforms and rushes to the 
bases exit. Getting outside, he spots the sturdy looking robot 
standing not far from the base with a nasty looking gun in his hands.

"Hey hey! Watch where you're shooting that thing!" he says as a shot 
rocks the shields, "Oh boy, that's it." A laser rifle pops out of 
SharpClaws' left arm, and attaches itself there. A blast shield 
folds out on his right arm, and the bot leaves the forcefield, 
firing 3 blasts in quick succession at Rockseeker.

<<Hydras::

Alarms ran inside Predacon's base, Hydras roared angerend and 
checked whatwas going on when he saw that a bot was shooting against 
the base he opended a com link to Tankor and SharpClaws "A bug are 
attaking our base... terminate him go with caoution could be a 
tramp">>
